String.string: (not shown)
Sacrificial target selected.
Nightmare Kalioth's Resistance I has ended.
Nightmare Kalioth's Resistance II has ended.
Enter your final words now.
Mercy not found.
Dispersing collected mana!
Escape option disabled.
Antaroth is collecting unstable mana.
Greatly empowered when mana is stabilized.
Fatal error...
The gates will close soon.
Entering central administration zone. Security level increased.
Please adhere to the security regulations for the facility and your own safety.
Now entering the restricted zone.
Defeat Nightmare Ghergof with a summoned Lancer.
Destroy the Summoning Stone and summon a helper.
Defeat Nightmare Kalioth with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Nightmare Antaroth with a summoned Lancer.
Defeat Nightmare Ghergof with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Nightmare Kalioth with a summoned Priest.
Defeat Nightmare Antaroth with a summoned Priest.
You can find Divine Pylons on both sides of the entrance. Destroy the pylons from within 10m when needed.
You must defeat the Nameless Spectre to pass the passage.
The dungeon is now closed. Type '/reset' or use the 'Reset Instances' button in your Character Profile (P).
Attack while I use Infuriate!
MORE AGGRO!
I'll hold this thing off! Give it your best shot!
I've activated Adrenaline Rush and Guardian Shout! Attack!
Use battle solutions and additional items before combat.
Battle solutions can be purchased from the <font color = '#FFFF00'>Training Dungeon Merchant</font>.
